title.narrative: Support to FIRA for the Implementation of an Energy Efficiency Financing Strategy for the Food Processing Industry

description.narrative: To support the efforts of the Government of Mexico in promoting energy efficiency and rational use of resources in the rural sector, while enhancing its competitiveness and reducing GHG emissions.

participating-org.narrative: Inter-American Development Bank, Inter-American Investment Corporation and Multilateral Investment Fund

activity-date.narrative: Planned start date of the activity

mailing-address.narrative: The World Bank, 1818 H Street, NW, Washington, DC 20433 USA
